scripts.test:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node --inspect-brk -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand
scripts.migration:generate: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- migration:generate src/migrations/%npm_config_name% -d src/config/typeorm.config.ts
scripts.migration:create: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- migration:create src/migrations/%npm_config_name% -d src/config/typeorm.config.ts
scripts.migration:run: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- migration:run -d src/config/typeorm.config.ts
scripts.migration:revert: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- migration:revert -d src/config/typeorm.config.ts
scripts.migration:show: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- migration:show -d src/config/typeorm.config.ts
scripts.migration:run:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- migration:run -d dist/config/typeorm.config.js
scripts.migration:revert:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- migration:revert -d dist/config/typeorm.config.js
scripts.migration:show:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- migration:show -d dist/config/typeorm.config.js
